column5: Here's the report from the Ottawa Citizen about yesterdays snowmachine thru the ice.  http://www.ottawacitizen.com/news/Napanee+...9809/story.html  We are saddened by this loss and hope that everyone plays SAFE.  David Delcloo  aka  Superdad
Crappy...my thoughts and prayers go out to the family and friends...and to everyone else be careful out there this weekend on the ice it's gonna be a warm one
